sections.heading: Victim; duty.To receive the notices provided for in sections 81-1848 to 81-1848
sections.text: 02, a victim shall keep the county attorney informed of his or her current address and telephone number.SourceLaws 1990, LB 87, ยง 10;Laws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 510;Laws 2004, LB 270, ยง 15.
